1.title: Share the Love
1.description: This lovely badge was earned by users who shared their favorite Twitch clips in February 2025.

1.title: Twitch Recap 2025
1.description: This exclusive badge was earned by the top 20% of Twitch users in 2025.

message.body: i see we're back to loathing

929 more to go bux88Bengriggimus

he wrote like "the shelljump is the hardest it took me 3 hours"
and i was just reading that like "if I knew that took me just 3 hours, i'd genuinely play cataclysm"
great!
it's not even the last room
which is funny because the keysurf room is unironically the reason i didn't want to actually try it
because the 1 thing i remember from playing :3 was that the double keysurf was the worst part
it's probably way easier than i remember, but it's unironically the reason i didn't want to try it originally
hooray!
yeah but that phrasing makes me worry about literally everything else
also @cape room, i still don't know any TAS cape so as far as room go, i'd actually be most worried about that
i read noise's comments as well and lol
he did not like the precision
it's certainly not a hack for everyone
or most people, probably
i don't remember thinking :3 was that bad...
minus the keysurf and okay i quit the ghost house so maybe i did
or well, didn't even really try
yeah i did
lol
i wonder if i still have the movie file

gl pillar
it's just that easy
oh right
3 parts is basically as good as 2 right?
and 2 is basically 1 anyway
hii gl
the famous pillar jump
reminds me of how i feel with the chateau triple light switch wall jump into door entry
are we loathing this jump?
scientifically crafted to optimize absurdity
how many y-subpixels are good for this?
at least we get to hear the same 2 beats over and over again.
Dacin o/
ba ba
if itâ€™s any consolation at all  this room is next for me
1 beat but it gets drawn out by snes 9x being paused.
good evening Bux
rooms like this make me glad I'm a cape sicko more than i am a precision sicko
if i ever learned lua scripts i would be unstoppable
like that's the only thing stopping me from throwing myself at pit hacks
HF no, donâ€™t give her the power.  she just said that sheâ€™ll be unstoppable
this is valuable and dangerous information

ðŸ‘€

bookmarked

and if something is broken, please let me know on discord.
that makes sense
step 1: enable everything and figure out what is what Kapp
who needs to see the game
step 1: disable everthing and wonder why you got the script in the first place. Kappa
on a serious note, there is a lot of stuff that you don't need most of the time.
(but when you need it, you really need it.)
right now i use snes9xrr ram watch for literally everything it's a pain in the ass
mhm
I always have the fat sprite table on, but somehow people hate it??
yes, because I always have yoshi
and I don't really use the small yoshi info
is that the misc table I asked for a check box for?
yes, that table.
i only ever turn that one when i actually need it
the small yoshi info is useless once you have invisi yoshis.
and when i do i usually just turn off all tables except the ones i want
it is quite large and in the way when not needed
but then you have to know what adress the ram address has.
given computers addresses was a mistake
no, you just have to know which column does what
clearly the solution is to label the columns with the address
so column 4 is tongue length, but no idea what address that is.
ok but column 4 changes whenever i open it because i turn off all the irrelevant ones
most of the time i don't even have 4 columns when i use it
@TheBiob ...somehow nobody has though of that in 10 years of script development.
did you see the yossy hack yesterday hf
so what I did instead is lable columns by what they do for yoshi.
something I didnâ€™t know when I was playing this room:  this game has a warp zone, like Cave 1, so if you wanted to you could always circle back to this room.
values are 3 wide (non-hex), so you could make the columns wider (or split labels across 2 rows).
you can get to any room from the start
there's a fake wall
next to the moon in the gamer challenge
@flips_bad that's a true statment: just beat the rooms in between Kapp
new file, there is a secret map16 edit hallway to the right a few tiles above the noteblock
MingLee
yeah the wall right of the moon is fake
inb4 it's a ploy to make HF get the moon.
itâ€™s like a tile lower than the moon
I'm famously devious
but if you stop hitting the message box, how will we know that The Cave of Loathing is trade marked?
oh wait, this is v2.3, then it's to the left of the yoshi coin Kapp
:o
fascinating
if I had been smart enough to look for it ask about a warp zone, I probably would have passed 1-4 and just dabbled in it a little bit each day while progressing other rooms
does the jump button do anything else
finally, we figured out it's not hiding inside the muncher.
Noteblocks, you may learn it
best opening trick lol
in 30 min we'll need your help to find the hidden p-switch.
when I was doing the room, I was averaging one attempt landing the pillar jump every 10-15 minutes or so
I wasnt tracking attempts to pillar, but probably one in every 10 or 20 Marios made it to the pillar?
I practiced a lot over many days to get to that point
I was skeptical I would ever win, too.  took me by surprise when I did
5/10 music
looks a lot more possible than hitting it on the first go
we found the TAS strat
you can
itâ€™s like the start of room 3
the recon phase is my favorite part of every room
upward moving one tile gap with a falling Rex was the first setup in 1-4
part of me wishes I saved my clears to make a clear vod for spelunkers that come after me.
how's spinjumping even going to help
reasonable
was scrolling disabled in this?
I can do midairs everytime at frame advance speed :)
GL hard game
the opposite actually, i was just wondering if you can spawn the rex earlier maybe you can avoid having to jump into the muncher gap twice
in 2018 would this have been kaizo hard?
wow that is a gnarly trick
tbh if i had seen this without context i'd expect it to be kaizo hard
I like to flirt with the line but not cross it, the section length is the only thing that keeps it reasonable
nix did you play any maker precision?
Nah I never played the full hack in one session.
Also never played any maker shao
I think Cave 1 could be beaten in 1 session
This I am less sure about
But people keep getting better
I just dont think people are that consistent yet
might drive yourself crazy going for a single session clear LUL
Yeah for sure, I could see knocking out a full zone of 5 rooms in 1 day
With a lot of practicee
@nixkillsmyths I have pondered about the practicality of a single zone speedrun of Cave 1
You could do zone by zone speedruns with the warp zone, and treat the hack as independent chunks
shoulda left that kaizo unoutlined
Maybe after doing that a bunch for each zone a full hack would feel more possible
I treat most of my precision hacks like a crossword or something, not as things usually to be binged
pressing the random button is fun, though
random button was the best possible outcome
Like something you do for 30m to 1h
Yeah for sure, its a big commitment
2 hours is my usual limit with Cave 2, but 2 hours is also my limit with most smw
If you do ever decide to go through with tools I would certain love to see it
stream plan for the year: 1h of cave, 3h random
lol
hf have you ever seen my hack?
gotta make roulette more popular in smw
gemstones, like a year old. i don't think it would be very interesting to tas but i've always wanted to see someone try
actually i don't know if people do smw roulette
it's just silly cape stuff that i thought of from watching pit hacks
yeah for sure, there isn't much you can do with kaizo
im so excited for celeste b sides lol

I think the new yoshi fly hack will be an interesting TAS to see if someone picks that up, the berries being forced makes the routing interesting in some cases, and there are so many movement variations

anything

but the problem with my hijack is it only checks if the sprite you're licking is a berry and resets the berry flag if it detects it's a non berry
make of that what you will
it checks if it's a mushroom with the berry flag set
yeah
Berry code upsets me so much, why is it so complicated.
I am still really sad there is no way to do berries on moving layer 2
AND the static layer 2 and vertical fix for berries APPARENTLY only works for object window berries, not Map16 berries with a different direct access number
literally fix every berry glitch just be removing his god forsaken tongue lol
the only other berry hijack i made was to stop the berry flag from being set when you move in front of a berry with a null sprite in your mouth
so swallowing the null sprite then gives you a free berry
"this makes sense, you should survive this" - hf, halfway inside a deathblock
how does sticky fly behave with yoshi
right
last year i came up with an rta method for indefinite yoshi stickyfly
it's cursed but very learnable
mine doesn't use dismounts nah
just some very skillful wiggling
basically wiggle to stall until you can stick your tongue back out and repeat. every cycle you drop like half a tile from the ceiling but you keep your dive potential the whole time
also yeah that was it. this is the same thing rta https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q0TFSqIcMx4
are you ever not screwed by stopping flight
well
how many of the berries do you need
cause some of them might be difficult to get without

time to dupe one of them

mods

legally no one can stop you from being dm'd
the correct thing to do is to question how many of the keys you can skip

lol
that is neat
fuck now you're caught up with me in the hack
oh hf i literally *just* found a glitch in this level lol. it doesn't seem to help you win though
you can use the custom sprite to permanently disable mario's collision with everything
i do it by spitting the orb off the side of the screen and then teleporting to it
the problem is there doesn't seem to be any way to get collision back
the orbs dont despawn so to prevent lag  you have to drop them in pits as you go
if you find a way to get collision back let me know lol
the gimmick itself was unknowingly decheese
Yeah it would mostly just be routing / speed of movement
ty for checking it out
ty stream, was fun c:
